data.title: App, Web, Design, Animation & Video
data.meta_description: Our-Work Archive | App, Web, Design, Animation & Video | Eon Visual Media
data.meta_site_name: Eon Visual Media - App, Web, Design, Animation & Video
data.text:
Marketing Support for Hull Sport!

Here at Eon Visual Media, we have a great working relationship with The University of Hull, including Hull Sport. After a £17 million upgrade to the sports facilities, they knew it was time to invest in a high-quality online presence, including both on their website and social media.

Find out more

Creating an Interactive QR Code Trail!

As part of our partnership, this year we developed an interactive QR code trail, with quizzes and augmented reality elements for visitors to The Business Day to get involved with. We wanted to increase footfall at main sponsor stands and encourage visitors to network and interact more at the event!

Find out more

Creating Content for The Business Day 2024!

Every year, Eon Visual Media have the pleasure of being a main sponsor at The Business Day event held at Bridlington Spa. We’re proud to work alongside the fabulous team at The Spa to film the event, the insightful keynote sessions, and create a series of marketing materials including highlights videos, a time-lapse and attendee interviews.

Find out more

Redeveloping Hull KR’s Website!

Having worked with Hull KR previously (our relationship going back to 2003!), we were asked to redevelop the website to make it fully functional to support their needs.

Find out more

Marketing Support for P.A.U.L For Brain Recovery!

Founder, Paul Spence, approached us here at Eon Visual Media for support with their marketing and communications. We have an ongoing relationship with the charity, after previous projects and fundraising missions!

Find out more

Creating a Promotional Video for East Riding of Yorkshire Council

Our team of videographers filmed on location to capture some footage to create a promotional video for the Adult Learning and Employability division of East Riding of Yorkshire Council.

Find out more

Website & SEO Support for Weedon Direct!

Weedon Direct approached us here at Eon Visual Media to redesign and update their website as well as provide SEO and PPC ad support.

Find out more

Colostomy Animation for Welland Medical!

The animation was part of a number of videos created to support the launch of the Aurum® Plus Soft Convex pouches to be used in launch campaigns across their website, social media and to support their sales efforts.

Find out more

Creating Exciting Animations for Scholl!

Scholl, foot care experts, approached us to create a toolkit of animations and e-details to refresh the look and feel of their existing assets to align with marketing materials.

Find out more

Adding AR to the FLX Health App!

Following on from adding gamification elements to encourage continuous use of the app, adding AR creates a really innovative and immersive way for users to view their history of reported pains and injuries, as well as what they have done to alleviate symptoms.

Find out more

The Business Day 2023!

The Business Day 2023 was set to be a great event, and what a spectacular day it was! The 2023 seaside themed event gathered businesses from across the region for a day of networking, great food, keynote speakers and the usual insightful breakout sessions.

Find out more

A Royal Occasion – Filming the King’s Coronation for Hull City Council

Hull City Council approached us here at Eon Visual Media to capture some footage of Coronation events funded by Hull City Council in the local area. Part of this included attending community events throughout Hull with various businesses and charities, whilst they hosted arts and crafts sessions and community get-togethers.

Find out more

Creating a Promotional Video for Shade Zone!

Following a recommendation, we were approached by Shade Zone to create a promotional video to showcase their Hull showroom!

Find out more

Updating The Weedon Group Website!

We worked with The Weedon Group to update their website, including design and content, to improve speed, SEO and performance.

Find out more

Creating an Informative Animation for Manchester Arena!

We created an informative animation for Manchester Arena to convey safety information and updates!

Find out more

FLX Health App Gamification!

After developing the original FLX Health app, we were tasked with adding gamification features to continue engagement!

Find out more

Eon’s Valentine’s Day Randomiser Filter!

We created a randomiser filter for the season of love! Find your perfect date!

Find out more

Creating a Matterport Virtual Tour for Eyeweb!

We created a Matterport virtual tour for design and marketing agency Eyeweb!

Find out more

Celebratory Video for Hull City Council!

We were approached by Hull City Council to create a promotional video celebrating 20 years of the MKM Stadium.

Find out more

Hull Silver Squash Tournament Live Stream

We were approached by Hull University to livestream the finals of the Hull Silver Squash Tournament, gathering talented players from across the country!

Find out more

Updating the Dashboard for the FLX Health App!

After previously working with FLX to develop their FLX Health app, we were approached for some general dashboard updates after the app launch and customer feedback.

Find out more

Developing a Bespoke Event Microsite!

We were approached by a healthcare communications and PR company to create a bespoke event microsite. The main objectives were to create a dedicated media room platform for journalists to find event information and download press release kits, as well as book interviews with spokespeople.

Find out more

Inspire Ignite eBooks!

We created some high-quality eBooks for Inspire Ignite combining audio and visual elements, to engage children in reading and literacy!

Find out more

Creating an Online Magazine for SecuriCare

Part of the CliniMed group, SecuriCare specialise in stoma and continence care supplies. As part of their care, education and support, they provide a free online and printed magazine for their customers.

Find out more

Transforming E-Commerce Images for Mr P!

We transformed artwork and images for Mr P to showcase their new luxury foil packaging on e-commerce platforms!

Find out more

Creating AR Pet Filters for Springfield Solutions!

Springfield Solutions were approached to create AR pet filters that can be accessed via the labelsof a fictitious pet care brand, Woof and Meow.

Find out more

Creating an Engaging 360 Video Tour for Ansell!

In this case study, we explore how our team of videographers captured 360 video tour footage and edited this into an engaging and interactive virtual experience!

Find out more

Creating Content for Business Day 2022!

Read about our experience at Business Day and see some of the content our talented team were able to produce for the event.

Find out more

Developing an Interactive QR Code for the Allam British Open!

We explore how our marketing team developed an engaging QR code campaign for the Allam British Open, allowing spectators to interact and vote on the outcome of the tournament.

Find out more

Creating an Informative Animation for Sypro!

In this case study, we explore how our animation team created a brand-new animated video to help promote Sypro’s risk management software.

Find out more

Creating an Incredible Parallax Website for Springfield Solutions!

We explore how our development team at Eon Visual Media designed and developed a brand-new website for Springfield Solutions.

Find out more

Exciting Social Media Filters for Oh Yes! Net Zero!

In this case study, we explore how our development team created an engaging social media filter to help promote Oh Yes! Net Zero campaign!

Find out more

Developing an April Fool’s Day Filter

In this case study, we explore how our development team created a randomiser filter for social media to support our April Fool’s Day marketing campaign!

Find out more

Developing an Award-Winning Education App for Chatta

In this case study, we explore how our development team helped Chatta to create, maintain and develop their innovative education app!

Find out more

High Quality Video Production for P.A.U.L For Brain Recovery

In this case study, we will explore how our videography team captured and produced a brand-new video for P.A.U.L For Brain Recovery.

Find out more

An Engaging Sales E-Detail for CliniMed

Our team designed and developed a brand-new e-detail and interactive PDF document for CliniMed Ltd.

Find out more

A Valentine’s Day Marketing Campaign with Augmented Reality!

In our case study, we explore how our team created an engaging augmented reality experience and bespoke graphics to support our Valentine’s Day marketing campaign.

Find out more

Developing a Powerful Healthcare App for FLX!

Our team helped FLX develop a brand-new physiotherapy app to support musculoskeletal health and reduce the risk of MSDs.

Find out more

Creating a Festive Augmented Reality Message!

We decided to explore a new way of getting into the Christmas spirit using festive augmented reality! Curious about what that entails? You can read all about it.

Find out more

And We’re Live! Live Streaming the Aura CDT Conference

In September 2021, our videography team were recruited by Aura to film and deliver live video coverage of the annual Centre for Doctoral Training (CDT) Conference.

Find out more

Capturing Poems, Music & Stories for Hull Maritime Museum!

In this case study, we explore how our videography team captured a variety of different artists and produced a series of short films for Hull Maritime Tales Week.

Find out more

Connecting the Humber to the Globe – Broadcasting Tech Week Humber 2021!

Earlier this year, we were delighted to announce that Eon Visual Media would be a key event sponsor and official Media Partner for Tech Week Humber 2021. In this case study, we explore how our team co-ordinated these live broadcasts and produced a highlights video for the conference.

Find out more

And We’re Live! Broadcasting The Waterline Summit 2021!

We explore how our team played a key role in co-ordinating and hosting various live and hybrid broadcasts throughout The Waterline Summit and helped to connect the Humber to COP and beyond!

Find out more

Boosting Engweld’s Online Sales With a New Ecommerce Website

In this case study we will explore how our web team developed the brand-new ecommerce website for Engweld, and how we have continued to maintain and update the platform since this initial development.

Find out more

Creating a Spooktacular Halloween Campaign!

We love our seasonal campaigns at Eon Visual Media! With this, our marketing team wanted to go all out in 2021 and develop a spooky Halloween campaign. The aim of this project was to create an entertaining marketing campaign and show off our creative videography services!

Find out more

Engaging Augmented Reality Experiences for Springfield Solutions!

We explore how our team developed two augmented reality experiences to help Springfield Solutions to create an engaging user experience.

Find out more

Blooming With Creativity – Producing an Animation for Springfield Solutions!

Our team at Eon Visual Media had the opportunity to flare our creative muscles and create a brand-new cosmetics brand for Springfield Solutions. In this case study, we explore how our creative team created a brand-new animated video for the BLOOM branding.

Find out more

Creating a Microsite & Animation for Hull KR!

When professional rugby league club Hull Kingston Rovers approached our team to help bring their new club identity to life, we could not resist the opportunity to flex our creative muscles and be part of the evolution of the club. Eon Visual Media were recruited to produce a series of visual assets to help communicate the rationale behind this new brand identity and help promote the launch.

Find out more

An Engaging Augmented Reality Experience for Welland Medical Limited!

Last year, Eon Visual Media were recruited by Welland Medical Limited to produce an AR experience to help promote a new range of stoma pouches called ‘Aurum Plus’.

Find out more

A Day in the Life Induction Video for Arco’s Brand New Blackfriargate Office!

Last year, Eon Visual Media were recruited by safety experts Arco to produce a day in the life video production to help engage colleagues with the facilities offered by their brand-new £16m Blackfriargate office development.

Find out more

Cosmetic Brand Design for Springfield Solutions

In our case study, we explore how our Graphic Designers at Eon Visual Media created a brand-new cosmetics brand design for Springfield Solutions.

Find out more

Informative Animation for Welland Medical

Eon Visual Media were recruited by Welland Medical Limited to produce an animated video to educate viewers on the importance of skin health around a stoma, and the impact of Manuka honey in supporting healthy skin.

Find out more

Aurum Plus Videos for Welland Medical

Eon Visual Media were recruited by Welland Medical Limited to produce a series of visual assets to help promote a brand-new product launchof stoma pouches called ‘Aurum Plus’.

Find out more

Live Video Coverage for the Business Day

In this case study, we will explore all the various creative ways in which our marketing team designed and developed visual marketing content to help promote our partnership for The Business Day event.

Find out more

Hull Animal Welfare Charity Promotional Video

As media production partner for The Business Day event, we produced a promotional business video for Hull Animal Welfare Trust. The premise for this video production was to tell the story of HAWT, as well as the incredible work carried out by volunteers.

Find out more

Daisy Appeal Charity Promotional Video!

As media production partner for The Business Day event, we produced a promotional business video for The Daisy Appeal. The premise for this video was to tell the story of the charity as well as the incredible life-saving work carried out by the partnership including its research into cancer, heart disease and dementia.

Find out more

Bishop Burton College Promotional Video for The Business Day!

As media production partner for The Business Day event, we produced a promotional video for Bishop Burton College. The premise for this production was to inform viewers on the key focuses of education as well as the role of agriculture in tackling the climate crisis.

Find out more

JZ Flowers Promotional Video for Business Day

As media production partner for The Business Day event, we produced a promotional business video for JZ Flowers International Limited. The premise for this video production was to inform viewers on the origins of the business and explain the journey of a bouquet.

Find out more

And We’re Live! The Business Day Live Stream

In 2020, our videography team were recruited to film and deliver live video coverage of The Business Day event. With a total of five cameras and two locations, our stream was vision mixed live on the day, combining live footage with high quality graphics and pre-recorded content in to one cleanly mixed feed.

Find out more

Pre-Recorded Footage for Business Day!

In 2020, our videography team were recruited to film and deliver live video coverage of The Business Day event. As well as delivering live video coverage of the event, our team were also responsible for preparing a series of pre-recorded video clips and stings which would be presented throughout the live-stream.

Find out more

Live Streaming Humber Business Week

In June 2021, our videography team were recruited to film and deliver live stream coverage of the launch of Humber Business Week.

Find out more

Creating a New Cosmetic Brand for Springfield Solutions!

Back in 2020, our team at Eon Visual Media were recruited to create a new cosmetics brand for Springfield Solutions. This project allowed us to create a new brand design including animations, graphics video productions and an augmented reality experience.

Find out more

Live Streaming the East Riding of Yorkshire Council AGM Event!

In May 2021, our videography team were recruited to film and provide a live video stream of the East Riding of Yorkshire Council AGM event.

Find out more

Eon EastAR Augmented Reality

After a gloomy 12 months of self-isolation, we wanted to go all-out and celebrate Easter our way, so that’s why we decided to develop our very our augmented reality Easter experience!

Find out more

Creating an Augmented Reality Label That Talks

Springfield was looking for a way to bring their labels to life and demonstrate interactive packaging capabilities. Using Augmented Reality, we decided to create a ‘Talking Label’! Our challenge was to bring one of the labels to life using augmented reality, so we started off making the ‘Our Liz’ label.

Find out more

Brand-New Website Design & Digital Marketing for Hull Sport

Hull Sport were doing a great job of attracting students, staff and locals to the campus, and they knew they needed an online offering to match. The sports department wanted to upgrade their communications, included their website and social media marketing. Check out the full case study to see how we did it!

Find out more

A New Website Design for Hull City’s Commercial Offerings

We have recently launched a brand new and exciting commercial website for local football club Hull City. We’ve worked with the club before and it has been great to collaborate with such a local powerhouse again on this approach to promoting their sponsorship and hospitality offerings at the club.

Find out more

New Branding Design – The Air For Life Story

Creating. Inspiring. Digital. This is our mantra, and it’s exactly how we managed to take a brand from a concept to an award-winning and life-saving product.

Find out more

Yorkare’s New Luxury Website

Yorkare are an award winning care home provider based in East Yorkshire, with homes in Beverley, Hessle, Cleethorpes & Hornsea. What makes Yorkare stand out is the modern facilities embedded in each of the homes. The homes are kitted out with a cinema, hair salon and even a bar, creating a commu…

Find out more

March Foods: Factory Tour in 360°

March Foods are a co-packer filling a wide range of packaging formats for a number of global brands; Unilever, Tate & Lyle, Robinsons, Danone, Kellogg’s etc. The unique facility at March Foods allows the company to be super agile, configuring packaging to accommodate various products, from cerea…

Find out more

Creating a 360 Video Tour for Asda

As one of the UK’s largest supermarkets, Asda are always on the hunt for techniques to improve the store experience for their customers. With the grand opening of one of their new flagship stores in Patchway, they sought the opportunity to reveal the new store with a 360 video tour.

Find out more

Brainworks Bars With Incredible Image Recognition!

We’re excited to announce the official release of the Brainworks App! Download the app to scan your Brainworks bar, which uses image recognition to enable users to access brain training games, as well as additional information about the product & the brand.

Find out more

Cheese Production on the Farm for ASDA

Our film crew recently travelled across The Pennines to Cheshire, to film cheese being produced at a local distributor, Joseph Heler.

The cheese factory provides cheese to major retailers, including ASDA. When the cows on the Joseph Heler farm listen to Calvin Harris music, it helps them pro…

Find out more

Behind the Scenes at TEDx Hull 2018

We were delighted to be asked again to cover the highly anticipated TEDxHull event, for 2018!

We’re super proud of our heritage here in Hull and we love that such influential events as TED Talks continue to return here. TED Talks offers the chance for audience members to listen to a variety o…

Find out more

Creating Visual Assets for Ideal Standard

Our partnership with Ideal Standard has spanned over a decade. We’ve partnered with them closely on their video, animation and digital innovation projects, helping them to market their bathroom products in a unique and creative way.

Our most recent project has taken us down the animation and…

Find out more

Website & Stunning Aerial Footage for RMS Humber Ports!

RMS Humber Ports are a shipping and ports company who came to us needing a brand new look for their website.

Find out more

Healthcare Video Production for PhD Nutrition!

Eon Visual Media recently filmed, directed and edited the latest campaign for PhD Nutrition, a leading supplement & sport nutrition company.

Find out more

Character Animation Design for PhD Nutrition’s SmartBar™

We recently shot a campaign video for PhD Nutrition, a leading supplements and sports nutrition company. As well as filming, we assisted with planning, storyboarding and scripting of the campaign for PhD – market leaders in high protein, low sugar nutrition products.

They came t…

Find out more

Hodor Goes North of the Border! TransPennine Express Social Media Campaign

We shot and directed a social media campaign for TransPennine Express, starring ‘Game of Thrones’ actor Kristian Nairn, who plays the iconic and well-loved character Hodor. The rail company wanted a short promotional video to show off their latest project – the ‘Exstream’ ser…

Find out more

Hologram Display for Conferences and Exhibitions

The latest addition to the Eon tech hub is our Hologram unit. The remarkable unit is a great platform for grabbing a lot of attention at exhibitions, conferences, point-of-sale or in general retail environments. Measuring less than two feet wide and one foot in height, our hologram unit is being use…

Find out more

360 Virtual Tour – UK City of Culture

As part of the countdown to UK City of Culture 2017, Hull city centre hosted a spectacular public event. As night fell, a number of angels began to appear, high up on the rooftops. They took to the air, magically suspended above the waiting crowd below.

Find out more

Animated Explainer Video for InterestFree4Cars!

InterestFree4cars have a relatively simple proposition based around 0% interest finance deals for buying cars. They came to us because they wanted an easy to understand visual solution to demonstrate just how straightforward it is to buy a car from them.

We scripted and storyboarded concepts…

Find out more

Corporate Video Production for ASDA – Charlie & the Chocolate Factory

Dreams can come true! When a little boy called Charlie (yes, really!) wrote to Asda to tell them how much he liked their eggs it was a PR opportunity not to be missed. Asda organised for Charlie to have a VIP tour of Walker’s Chocolate Factory.

Find out more

Creating Instructional Videos for Scholl

During 2016 and 2017 Scholl has launched a number of pan-european brand extensions across it’s range of foot healthcare products. We shot and created a series of consumer friendly instructional videos to demonstrate product features and benefits. The videos feature a mix of video and 3D…

Find out more

Conference Video for UK Retailer B&M Ltd

B&M is one of the fastest growing retailers in the UK, averaging a new store opening every 4-5 days. For their first ever “Golden Quarter” conference, we were asked to produce a conference opener video incorporating live action, motion graphics and drone footage. The aerial coverage…

Find out more

Filming Tour de Yorkshire Event

The beautiful East Yorkshire scenery was a thrilling backdrop as the counties towns and villages once again played host to the Tour de Yorkshire in 2017.

In a seven camera shoot, we had film crews sited at multiple strategic points along the route to get crowd vox pops and to film the build-up and…

Find out more

A Tasty Viral Video for Kellogg’s with Andrea McLean

We shot 3 short films on location, including one featuring Loose Women star Andrea McLean, to publicise how Kellogg’s Cornflakes can help defend against seasonally affected disorder (SAD). The videos feature a specially commissioned cereal bowl which emits light to mimic sunlight, thereby helping pe…

Find out more

Video Production for TEDx Hull

TED Talks are a series of hugely influential presentations from expert speakers on education, business, science, tech and creativity. Video recordings from Ted Talks are made freely available and generally attract huge global audiences due to their individual credibility and because of the power of…

Find out more

Capturing the Hull City of Culture Ambassador Event

UK City of Culture 2017 status has been a game changer for Hull and not just in cultural terms, visitor numbers and hotel occupancy rates have dramatically improved against the backdrop of a year long series of cultural events. Video has been a key tool in promoting and recording the massive calenda…

Find out more

An Interactive Sales E-Detail for Nurofen

We developed an interactive sales e-detail for a new Nurofen for Children temperature monitoring device for young children with fever.

Find out more

SmartPicture App – Goodbye to QR Codes

QR codes have been on the market for 10+ years but let’s face it, they’re pretty ugly. Enter our innovation & app development team. After months of research we launched our very own QR Code Killer – SmartPicture®

Find out more

Bespoke E-learning Programme for e.surv

e.surv Chartered Surveyors is one of the UK’s leading providers of residential surveying and property risk services. As a regulated business, e.surv has a responsibility to operate legally and ethically, ensuring compliance with rigorous legal standards and the ongoing competence of its survey…

Find out more
